meanings.definition: A person who makes or enacts laws.
meanings.sent1: The wise lawgiver created rules to keep everyone safe.
meanings.sent2: The lawgiver in our town council proposed a new ordinance.
meanings.sent3: The lawgiver decided to make a law that all pets must wear hats on Tuesdays.
meanings.sent4: She was seen as a lawgiver, shaping the legal landscape of the city.
meanings.sent5: The lawgiver's influence on society was profound and lasting.

meanings.definition: A deity or supernatural being believed to have given laws to humanity.
meanings.sent1: The ancient lawgiver was said to have bestowed the commandments upon the people.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, the lawgiver is seen as a divine figure who guides human behavior.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous lawgiver decided to play a prank by giving out silly laws.
meanings.sent4: Legends speak of a powerful lawgiver who shaped the destiny of nations.
meanings.sent5: The lawgiver's words were revered as sacred and unchanging.
